Bonjour à tous les nouveaux joueurs,

Pour commencer j'aimerais déconseiller ce jeu au personne ne supportant pas les comportements toxics ainsi que les cheaters. Contrairement à beaucoup de jeu dont le principe est le même, la compétition est rempli de cheater, je deconseilles ce jeu malgré qu'au il reste agréable à jouer sans les cheater et autres. Enfin si les devs du jeu pouvaient faire quelque chose pour contré ça, le jeu deviendrait surement parfait.
dis gem sux big ass, verry not good
Mt viciante dps que pega o jeito. Mas treinem mata-mata e casual antes de irem pro comp e serem xingados kkk. Tbm recomendo o game da steam "Aim Lab" para treinar mira

fun russia simulator but a bit bugged, I hit heads but my bullets seem to ricochet off of peoples head right back at me but other than that very good game, 2/3 game and 10/100 game in dog years, rat burger valve.

Ah, CS:GO, the game that never dies. Alongside the fact you'll have to practice for month's just to make a new account to get out of silver. You may make some friends, you probably will be screamed at in 7 different languages you may never knew existed. But at the end of the day, we all love this game for the same reason, skins.
Cs ainda é um jogo foda pra jogar com amigos e fechar times no comp ou jogar um casual, o problema são os xiter que aumentam a cada dia, mais ainda é um jogo divertido e da hora .
